law.text: Any person who violates KRS 332.202, 332.206(2) and (3), or 332.214 shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100) nor more than three hundred dollars ($300) or be imprisoned for not less than ten (10) days nor more than thirty (30) days, or both.
law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 11, effective March 31, 2003.
